Question: Prone to living beyond his means, John **** was imprisoned in the Marshalsea debtors' prison in Southwark London in 1824.
Hints: His plots were carefully constructed, and this person often wove in elements from topical events into his narratives.
Claire Tomalin's book, The Invisible Woman, argues that Ternan lived with this person secretly for the last 13 years of his life.
The only first-class carriage to remain on the track was the one in which this person was travelling.
